title: Fath Al-Andalus
overview: Tells the story of the Islamic leader Tariq bin Ziyad during the journey of the Islamic conquest of Andalusia during the state of Musa bin Nusair during the era of the Umayyad dynasty, reviewing the difficulties and obstacles he faced to achieve this conquest within the period of preparation for crossing the sea in order to conquer Andalusia, within the historical period between (89 AH until 96 AH / 709 AD to 715 AD).
